scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run pack:osx && electron-builder "dist/osx/Google Photos-darwin-x64/Google Photos.app" --platform=osx --out="dist/osx" --config=builder.json
scripts.archive: npm run archive:osx && npm run archive:win
scripts.archive:osx: npm run build:osx && zip -j "dist/osx/Google Photos-osx.zip" "dist/osx/Google Photos.dmg"
scripts.archive:win: npm run build:win && zip -j "dist/win/Google Photos-win.zip" "dist/win/Google Photos Setup.exe"
